oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Correspondence letter from H.W. Brandle to Jabez Pugh Cannon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two-page letter from H.W. Brandle to J.P. Cannon in response to Cannon's letters. Cannon's Civil War letters had been published in the National Tribune as a series. The letter mentions Hood's army, General Osterhaus, the 15th Illinois, and Joe; Johnson. Brandle was of the late 3rd Missouri Infantry.
